summary: As part of FY22 appropriations, Members of Congress could request to designate a certain amount of federal funding for specific projects in their communities. Congress approved $9.1 billion for 4,963 such projects. We track these funds to help ensure transparency. We found that generally: Recipients planned to use the funds for their intended purposes Federal agencies planned to conduct oversight of projects before they are...
title: Tracking the Funds: Sample of Fiscal Year 2022 Projects Shows Funds Were Awarded for Intended Purposes but Recipients Experienced Some Challenges
